site.title: Your Vision, Our Platform â€“ WoW-CMS
site.description: Unlock the potential of your ideas with WoW-CMS, where your vision becomes reality. Explore our versatile content management platform today.

hero.subtitle: Join our tight-knit community, where we specialize in creating CMS projects tailored for gaming enthusiasts.

community.menu-1-desc: In our discord you can find the latest information about our products, as well as support and a community willing to help you.
community.menu-2-desc: Our projects follow the Open-Source philosophy, all of these can be found on our Github.
community.menu-3-desc: A CMS focused on offering services for World of Warcraft servers. With more than 5 years of development.

feature.title: Our Mission: Transforming Gaming Community Interaction
feature.subtitle: We build a centralized CMS for gamers to connect, collaborate, and share experiences.

cards.card-1-desc: We embrace the open-source philosophy. Our CMS is built on the power of the community and transparency. We collaborate to make our code accessible to all, allowing for complete customization.
cards.card-2-desc: We've made our CMS truly global. With multilingual support, you can now experience our platform in your preferred language. The diversity of languages reflects our dedication to an inclusive community.
cards.card-3-desc: Our community is the heart of everything we do. Here, gamers and enthusiasts come together, share ideas, and create together. Join a passionate network of people who share your love for gaming and content creation.

footer.description: WowCMS is a passionate collective of web developers who devote their free time to crafting, overseeing, and nurturing content management systems (CMS) tailored specifically for the burgeoning online gaming community.

timeline.title: Exploring the WoW-CMS Project Journey: From Conception to Evolution
timeline.description: Join us as we uncover the narrative behind the inception, key milestones, and transformative decisions that have molded the WoW-CMS project into its present form.
timeline.text-1: The journey of WoW-CMS as a project officially begins. Initially it is started by two people Dzywolf and Darthar.
timeline.text-2: BlizzCMS Plus sees the light, soon the WoW-CMS.com website receives nearly 50,000 views in its launch, becoming the largest project launch.
timeline.text-3: What does destiny hold for us? No one knows, once BlizzCMS v1 came out we decided to take a turn and start development on v2.

contact.title: Frequently asked questions
contact.question1: What is a free and open-source CMS?
contact.answer1: A free and open-source CMS (Content Management System) is a platform where users can create, manage, and publish content online easily and efficiently. This type of CMS is characterized by being freely accessible, meaning anyone can use it for free and have access to the source code of the software. This allows users to customize, modify, and enhance the system according to their needs and preferences.
contact.question2: What are the advantages of using a free and open-source CMS?
contact.answer2: When using a free and open-source CMS, users benefit from several advantages. Some of the key advantages include:
contact.advantage1: Cost: Being free, it is affordable for anyone who wants to start a project.
contact.advantage2: Flexibility: The open-source code allows for modifications and customizations based on specific project needs.
contact.advantage3: Active community: Being open source, the community tends to be larger, so it is easy to find help.
contact.advantage4: Security: Being open-source, the code can be reviewed by the community to identify and address potential security vulnerabilities.
contact.answer3: The free updates that will be provided are based on the roadmap that we have laid out for this project. It is also possible that we will provide extra updates outside of the roadmap as well.
